channel.title: [Solved] Dialog audio level drops out when facing an NPC
channel.description:
Greetings,
I just started my first play-through and am having an issue where if I am facing the person talking to me, I can barely hear what they are saying - but as soon as I turn the mouse away from facing them, the dialog goes back to full volume and I can hear everything perfectly.
Has anyone else experienced this?
Thanks.
SOLVED: For some reason my headphones setup had a phase reversal issue which caused this problem. Fixed my audio issue, and now it's working as indended.
